CoinVesting

nodes.documentation:
@notice Allows the owner to revoke the vesting. Tokens already vested
remain in the contract, the rest are returned to the owner.
nodes.name: revoke

nodes.documentation: @dev Calculates the amount that has already vested but hasn't been released yet.
nodes.name: releasableAmount

nodes.documentation: @dev Calculates the amount that has already vested.
